main event: A civilian witness reported seeing a bright, circular light in the sky in Leadville, Colorado on June 4, 1960.
interesting points: The object was traveling in a southeasterly direction and disappeared behind a mountain ridge.,The sighting lasted for approximately 5 seconds.,The report includes one associated photograph depicting a landscape with a streak of light in the sky.,The sighting was reported on the same day as the event occurred.,The document is part of Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a bright, circular light in the sky
